name: Dr. Aple
description:
Retro action FPS made for the Game Off 2022 gam jam!

https://itch.io/jam/game-off-2022

This was done over the course of about 2ish weeks with a small team of about 3 main developers. 

Story

Needing medical help, you must venture out of your comfort zone and head into a strange city that offers medical aid at a price you can't refuse. However, once you get there, things start to go downhill...

Controls:

-Shift: Run

-Left Click: Fire Gun

-Right Click: Aim Gun

-Spacebar: Jump

-CTRL: Crouch

(note: Panderz also helped)
